ValidationRule.description: When Lead Stage is change from B4 to B4- then Status_Change_Reason__c is Mandatory before proceeding.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( Stage__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c , "B4"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c , "B4-") ), ISBLANK(TEXT( Status_Change_Reason__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a Status Change Reason before moving the Lead to B4 / B4-.
